== Pidavoor (628386) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Pidavoor is a village in the [[Pathanapuram]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 1667 hectares and harbouring 2676 households with total population of 9843 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Punalur]] is at a distance of 5 km. Male population is 4687 and female population is 5156. Scheduled Caste Population is 1281 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the village is 628386<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
